avg_numerator.__comment: Get total of all priority 1 and 2 bugs
avg_numerator.jql: project={{project}} AND status NOT IN (Done,Resolved,Closed) AND issuetype=Bug AND priority IN ('1-Critical, stop everything and fix','2-High, fix ASAP') ORDER BY fixVersion ASC

avg_denominator.__comment: Get total of all bugs in projects
avg_denominator.jql: project={{project}} AND status NOT IN (Done,Resolved,Closed) AND issuetype=Bug ORDER BY fixVersion ASC
